topic: mapping a picture on a curved surface
body:
Dear all,


Tiffany Stetiu-Otis, an architecture student in my Lighting Course at
McGill, would like to map an image onto a half-cylinder shaped ceiling
in a Radiance scene. Are there any cal files available for here to do
so? Any tips would be very much appreciated.


Christoph
Christoph Reinhart, Ph.D.                        
Associate Research Officer                      National Research
Council Canada         Institute for Research in Construction
Adjunct Professor                                    McGill University
School of Architecture
1200 Montreal Road M-24, Ottawa         Ontario K1A 0R6, Canada 
tel: (613) 993-9703                                  fax: (613) 954 3733
christoph.reinhart at nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
<blocked::mailto:christoph.reinhart at nrc-cnrc.gc.ca>
